FunctionalRequirements.Name: Voice-Activated Health Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide voice-activated reminders for users to take their medications and check their health metrics, ensuring clarity and simplicity in communication.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Caregiver Dashboard
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall include a caregiver dashboard that allows caregivers to monitor user adherence to health regimens, highlighting any missed medications or abnormal health readings.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Customizable Privacy Settings
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide users with customizable privacy settings that enable them to control what personal information and health data are shared with caregivers and how it is used.

FunctionalRequirements.Name: Scheduling Health Check Reminders
FunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall allow users to schedule health check reminders through voice commands, ensuring that the process is straightforward and accessible.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: User-Friendly Interface
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall provide a user-friendly interface that accommodates varying levels of technical literacy among older adults, ensuring ease of navigation and interaction.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Compliance with Health Regulations
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall comply with healthcare regulations such as HIPAA and GDPR to ensure the security and privacy of user data.

NonFunctionalRequirements.Name: Scalable Architecture
NonFunctionalRequirements.Description: The system shall be built on a scalable architecture that allows for the integration of additional health monitoring devices and features as they become available.
